title: Title of the clause
fullText:
Full text of the clause should be entered here, exactly as written in the original standard document. Preserve all punctuation and formatting.

Ensure that line breaks are maintained with \n characters.

Include any lists or sub-points (e.g., (a), (b), etc.) and maintain all references to other clauses and standards.

Preserve any notes or additional information that appears in the original document.
